name: Crescent (warwal)
description:
Entry for Godot Wild Jam #48 Moon

You are a servant of the moon. Collect moon fragments to go to the next level. Use your moon powers to traverse the level.

Idea with Wildcard:
Use "grappling hook" mechanics to traverse the platform.

Issues:
There a noticeable issue in the game, where the camera suddenly lose track of the player when you click multiple time on the grapple point, the only to reset is to click the restart button on top right of the screen.
